title: Whittemore Hall Micro Center Process Tool Installation and Renovation
description: Virginia Tech is seeking proposals for the Whittemore Hall Micro Center Process Tool Installation and Renovation project. Please refer to RFP document # 952642301 for additional details and associated drawings.

title: Ready Mixed Concrete
description: IFB to establish term contract for ready mixed concrete

title: Price Hall Exterior Stair Replacement
description: The project is generally described as the removal and replacement of the exterior stair system on the west elevation of Price Hall. All equipment, materials, labor, and services necessary for the installation of complete systems shall be provided.

title: Organizational Consulting Services
description: Virginia Tech is seeking to establish a contract for consulting services with a specialty in organizational structure in higher education.

title: A/E Services for Small Projects (Category B Pool)
description:
From time to time, Virginia Tech needs the expertise of the various architectural/engineering disciplines to accomplish its goals and objectives in the facility maintenance and construction areas. These services typically support small projects and are often needed in an expeditious manner.
Therefore, the purpose of this Request for Qualifications (RFQ) is to solicit qualification statements for the professional services of architectural/engineering firms, authorized to do business in the Commonwealth of Virginia, with experience in architectural design, architectural interiors, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, civil engineering, geotechnical engineering, structural engineering, asbestos/lead abatement design, and other professional services. Contracts will be executed on an as needed basis with fees commensurate with the identified scope of work. Under no circumstances will the fee exceed $80,000 including reimbursables.
